raw_body: Beloved husband of Kusum, much loved father of Sandamalee and Wathsala, loving father-in-law of Chaminda Perera (Sunpic) and Harsha Samarajiwa (CEO Wettasinghe Pharmaceuticals), adoring grandfather of Isurika, Nihara, Chaven, Kevan and Evan, loving brother of Amitha Weeratunge, late Daya, late Gamini, late Asoka, Kumara, Raja, Wimal and Lal Wettasinghe. Cortege leaves residence, 86, Uyana Road, Moratuwa at 3.30 p.m. on Friday 10th November for cr
